name: Cu chulainn: the hound of ulster
name_original: Cu chulainn: the hound of ulster
description:
In Cu Chulainn, the hound of Ulster, You play as an fallen
noble aiming to regain fame for his family, traveling
through Ireland towards ulster to become a soldier, wanting
become a noble again, however, during your way towards
ulster, you encountered the one and only Cu Chulainn, and
your destiny has changed from becoming a simple soldier of
ulster to becoming one of the most trusted Companion of the
demigod Cu Chulainn.
